movie.title: Mr. Right
movie.description_intro: After going through a painful break-up, a woman meets a man who appears to be perfect for her. However, as their relationship develops, she learns that he is a former hit-man. Their new, but genuine, relationship is tested even further as they try to save each other, from his dark past which has come back to haunt him.
movie.description_full: After going through a painful break-up, a woman meets a man who appears to be perfect for her. However, as their relationship develops, she learns that he is a former hit-man. Their new, but genuine, relationship is tested even further as they try to save each other, from his dark past which has come back to haunt him.

movies.title: Don Quixote
movies.summary: With his noble squire by his side, a retired country gentleman sets out on an adventure to right the wrongs of the world.
movies.description_full: With his noble squire by his side, a retired country gentleman sets out on an adventure to right the wrongs of the world.
movies.synopsis: With his noble squire by his side, a retired country gentleman sets out on an adventure to right the wrongs of the world.

movies.title: Menendez: The Day of the Lord
movies.title_english: Menendez: The Day of the Lord
movies.title_long: Menendez: The Day of the Lord (2020)
movies.summary: A retired priest hunted by his sins is pulled back into darkness when a friend begs him to help his possessed daughter.
movies.description_full: A retired priest hunted by his sins is pulled back into darkness when a friend begs him to help his possessed daughter.
movies.synopsis: A retired priest hunted by his sins is pulled back into darkness when a friend begs him to help his possessed daughter.

movies.title: Samurai Saga
movies.summary: Edmund Rostand's play Cyrano de Bergerac, transplanted to Japan. A poet-warrior with an oversized nose (matched only by his great heart) loves a lady. But she sees him only as a friend, so he helps another man to woo her by giving him the poetry of his own heart.

movies.title: The Slipper and the Rose: The Story of Cinderella
movies.title_english: The Slipper and the Rose: The Story of Cinderella
movies.title_long: The Slipper and the Rose: The Story of Cinderella (1976)
movies.summary: In the tiny kingdom of Euphrania, the King (Sir Michael Hordern) and his court are most anxious to get Prince Edward (Richard Chamberlain) wed. But Edward wants to marry for love. Meanwhile, young Cinderella (Gemma Craven) finds life drastically altered with her father's death, as she's forced to be a servant in her own house. But a cheery Fairy Godmother (Annette Crosbie) helps her with her impossible tasks, and even gets her to take an evening out at the King's bride-finding ball. But when the magic wears off, and the prince with shoe-in-hand searches for Cinderella and finds her, what is going to happen to Euphrania without the needed marriage alliance to prevent war?
movies.description_full: In the tiny kingdom of Euphrania, the King (Sir Michael Hordern) and his court are most anxious to get Prince Edward (Richard Chamberlain) wed.
